title: lay down guidelines for the transparent disposal by sale or otherwise of built up space, open lands
clause_text: lay down guidelines for the transparent disposal by sale or otherwise of built up space, open lands and balance FSI by the cotton textile mills; lay down guidelines for the opening, operation and closure of escrow accounts; approve proposals for the withdrawal and application of funds from the escrow accounts;

source_pdf.text_snippet: lay down guidelines for the transparent disposal by sale or otherwise of built up space, open lands and balance FSI by the cotton textile mills;
